name: Colourless Escape
description:
So in this game you are a simple man fleeing the castle dodging whatever the castle throws in your way, simple really.

And also this game isn't quite finished yet, the game jam is finished soon so I'll make do with what i have, the game have 2 level instead of 3 and is lacking in the sound department, so that's is what I'll fix in the next few days :)
